channel.title: [DavidScape] Dying?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I have tried applying the "Items lost on death tutorial" to this situation, however - I have had no luck.
How can I go about fixing pking in this server? Everytime someone dies in pking, the server crashes and the person who "died" is still in the wild with 0 hp.
If there is no fix for this, does anyone know how to turn off attacking in general, so I can prevent the server crash?
[b]Thanks in advance to those of you who answer![/b]
[B]Not sure which one you want, but here are both of them[/B]
Server side error
[URL=http://img62.imageshack.us/i/servererror.jpg/][IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/7913/servererror.jpg[/img][/URL]
Client side error [URL=http://img683.imageshack.us/i/clienterror.jpg/][IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/4199/clienterror.jpg[/img][/URL]
:)

item.title: [DavidScape] Dying?
item.dc:creator: @bode bode
item.description:
@bode wrote:

Souls`:

So… what do you want? A dying message? Dying place to end up?

Yes I would like a script that has the character die, spawn back in home, lose items… without crashing the server…

Does anyone have one and know where to add it?

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [DavidScape] Dying?
item.dc:creator: @bode bode
item.description:
@bode wrote:

Davidi2:

Did you keep a backup? Obviously you messed up the tutorial lol.

Yeah david, I have a back-up… I just redid everything. The server right now, is how it was when I downloaded it off your links… so right now, its how it was when you uploaded it.

Read full topic
